neodash_domain_properties.name: Aldo-keto reductase family 1 member c2. Chain: a, b. Synonym: 3-alpha-hsd3,chlordecone reductase homolog hakrd,dihydrodiol dehydrogenase 2,dd2,dihydrodiol dehydrogenase/bile acid-binding protein,dd/babp,trans-1,2-dihydrobenzene-1,2-diol dehydrogenase,type iii 3-alpha-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase.,1.1.1.357. Engineered: yes

parameters.neodash_enzymesubsubclass: Hydron translocation or charge separation linked to oxidoreductase reactions.
parameters.neodash_enzymesubsubclass_desc: With NAD(+) or NADP(+) as acceptor.
parameters.neodash_enzymesubclass_desc: Acting on the CH-OH group of donors.

neodash_pdb_properties.title: Crystal structure of 3-keto-L-gulonate 6-phosphate decarboxylase E112D/R139V/T169A mutant with bound L-xylulose 5-phosphate

reports.title: ProCogGraph v0.0.1 Summary
reports.query:
MATCH (pc:proteinChain) 
RETURN 
COUNT(DISTINCT(pc.pdbProteinChain)) as Count, 
"Unique PDB Chains" as Title
UNION
MATCH (a:entry) 
RETURN 
COUNT(DISTINCT(a.pdbEntry)) as Count, 
"PDB Entries" as Title
UNION
MATCH (be:boundEntity)
RETURN 
COUNT(DISTINCT(be.uniqueID)) as Count,
"Bound Molecules" as Title
UNION
MATCH(be:boundEntity)
RETURN
COUNT(DISTINCT(be.ligandUniqueID)) as Count,
"Distinct Bound Molecule Structures" as Title
UNION
MATCH (bio:cognateLigand) 
RETURN 
COUNT(DISTINCT(bio.uniqueID)) as Count, 
"Cognate Ligand Structures" as Title

![ProCogGraph Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/m-crown/ProCogGraph/main/images/PROCOGGRAPH%20full%20logo%20v1.png)
Welcome to ProCogGraph! 

To get started, select a tab:

reports.title: Global Parameters
reports.query: RETURN true;

settings.helperText: Select Domain Type (CATH, SCOP, Pfam, InterProHomologous Superfamily)

formFields.query:
WITH ["CATH", "SCOP", "Pfam","InterProHomologousSuperfamily"] AS list_of_domains
UNWIND list_of_domains AS domain
WITH domain, $input AS input_text
WHERE domain CONTAINS input_text
RETURN domain AS suggestion

WITH ["All", "Best"] AS options_list
UNWIND options_list AS option
WITH option, $input AS input_text
WHERE toLower(option) CONTAINS toLower(input_text)
RETURN option AS suggestion

reports.title: Explore $neodash_entry_pdbentry_1 Graph
reports.query:
CALL apoc.when($neodash_max_cognate = "Best", 'RETURN ["Y"] as cognate_options', 'RETURN ["Y", "N"] as cognate_options') YIELD value WITH value.cognate_options as cognate_options
MATCH (pc:proteinChain)-[j:IS_IN_PDB]->(pdb:entry {pdbEntry: $neodash_entry_pdbentry_1})<-[e:IS_IN_PDB]-(be:boundEntity)
WITH pc, j, pdb, e, be, cognate_options
OPTIONAL MATCH (be)<-[g:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]-(d)-[c:IS_IN_PROTEIN_CHAIN]->(pc)
WHERE d.type = $neodash_domain_filter_1
WITH be,g,d,c,pc,pdb,j,e, cognate_options
OPTIONAL MATCH (be)-[b:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(bl:cognateLigand)
WHERE b.parityScore >= toFloat($neodash_parity_score_cutoff) and b.bestCognate in cognate_options
RETURN be,bl,b,e,pdb,pc,j,d,c,g

reports.title: Ligand Similarity
reports.query:
CALL apoc.when($neodash_max_cognate = "Best", 'RETURN ["Y"] as cognate_options', 'RETURN ["Y", "N"] as cognate_options') YIELD value WITH value.cognate_options as cognate_options
MATCH (e:entry {pdbEntry: $neodash_entry_pdbentry_1})<-[:IS_IN_PDB]-(be:boundEntity)-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(bl:cognateLigand)
WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat($neodash_parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options
WITH * CALL {WITH be MATCH (be)-[:DESCRIBED_BY]-(bd:boundDescriptor) RETURN bd.descriptor as descriptor}
WITH be.hetCode as entityID, bl.name[0] AS CognateLigand, sim.parityScore AS parityScore, apoc.text.urlencode(apoc.convert.toJson({bl_name: bl.name[0], bl_smiles: bl.canonicalSMILES, parity: round(sim.parityScore, 3), parity_smarts: sim.paritySMARTS, parity_pdb: sim.parityMatchPDB, parity_bl: sim.parityMatchCognate, be_name:be.hetCode, be_smiles:descriptor})) as json,  sim.bestCognate as `Best Cognate`, bl.isCofactor as `Cofactor`, be.ligandUniqueID as be_ligandID, bl.uniqueID as bl_uniqueID
ORDER BY entityID, parityScore DESC
RETURN DISTINCT entityID as `HET Code`,  CognateLigand, parityScore as `Score`, `Best Cognate` as `Max`, `Cofactor` as `Cofactor`, "http://localhost:8080/procogdash/web/parity_viewer.html?data=" + json  as __iframe_url, "Parity Score: " + entityID + " - " + CognateLigand as __iframe_header, be_ligandID as __be_ligandID, bl_uniqueID as __bl_uniqueID
LIMIT 1000

reports.title: `$neodash_pdb_properties['pdbEntry']` Structure Report
reports.query:
**Title**: `$neodash_pdb_properties["title"]`  
**Description**: `$neodash_pdb_properties["description"]`  
**Keywords**: `$neodash_pdb_properties["keywords"]`  
  
INclude the pdb ligands (unique and total in the summary here)
PDB Entry `$neodash_pdb_properties["pdbEntry"]` contains **$neodash_d_count** unique $neodash_domain_filter_1 domain(s). At the current Parity Score cutoff ($neodash_parity_score_cutoff), PDB entry $neodash_entry_pdbentry_1 contains $neodash_bl_count potential cognate ligands with scores above the threshold. The PDB strucutre has the following assigned EC class(es):  
$neodash_pdb_ecs
maybe add about how many of the potential cognates are likely cofactor/coenzymes etc

reports.title: $neodash_domain_filter_1 Interactions
reports.query:
MATCH (e:entry {pdbEntry: $neodash_entry_pdbentry_1})<-[:IS_IN_PDB]-(pc:proteinChain)<-[:IS_IN_PROTEIN_CHAIN]-(d)-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]->(be:boundEntity)-[:IS_IN_PDB]->(e)
WHERE d.type = $neodash_domain_filter_1
WITH e,pc,d,int,be
WITH pc.chainID as Chain, d.domain AS Domain, properties(d) as __domain_properties, d.url as __domain_url, int.interactionMode as `Interaction Mode`, SIZE(apoc.convert.toList(int.proteinInterface)) as `Protein Interface Count`, be.displayID AS `PDB Ligand`, min(int.proteinInterface) as min_res, e.pdbEntry as pdbID, apoc.text.urlencode(apoc.convert.toJson({pdb_id: e.pdbEntry, bl_chain: be.boundLigandChain, bl_residues: be.boundLigandResidues, all_interface: int.allProteinInterface, interface_chain: pc.chainID, interface: int.proteinInterface})) as json
RETURN DISTINCT Chain + ":" + Domain as `Chain:Domain`,`PDB Ligand` , `Interaction Mode`, "View" as `Protein Interface`, `Protein Interface Count`,__domain_properties, __domain_url, "http://www.localhost:8080/procogdash/web/pdbe_molstar_viewer.html?data=" + json as __iframe_url, "Interface: " + Domain + " - " + `PDB Ligand` as __iframe_header, Domain as __domain

reports.title: $neodash_iframe_header
reports.query: $neodash_iframe_url

reports.title: Search
reports.query: RETURN true;

reports.title: Results
reports.query:
CALL apoc.when($neodash_max_cognate = "Best", 'RETURN ["Y"] as cognate_options', 'RETURN ["Y", "N"] as cognate_options') YIELD value WITH value.cognate_options as cognate_options
WITH $neodash_pdb_query AS searchString, cognate_options
MATCH (a:entry)-[:IS_IN_PDB]-(pc:proteinChain)
WHERE toUpper(a.pdbEntry) CONTAINS toUpper(searchString)
OPTIONAL MATCH (pc)<-[:IS_IN_PROTEIN_CHAIN]-(d:domain)
WHERE d.type = $neodash_domain_filter_1
WITH *
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)<-[:IS_IN_PDB]-(be)-[b:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(bl:cognateLigand)
WHERE b.parityScore >= toFloat($neodash_parity_score_cutoff) AND b.bestCognate in cognate_options
WITH count(distinct(d)) as d_count, a,count(distinct(bl)) as bl_count, COLLECT(DISTINCT(pc.ecList)) as nested_ecList
UNWIND nested_ecList as unique_ecLists
UNWIND unique_ecLists as flat_ecs
RETURN a.pdbEntry as `PDB ID`, "http://localhost:8080/procogdash/web/default.html" as __iframe, properties(a) as __pdb_properties, apoc.text.join(COLLECT(DISTINCT(flat_ecs)), ",") as __ecs, bl_count as __bl_count, d_count as __d_count

reports.title: `$neodash_domain_properties["domain"]` Domain Report
Table 2: SF Interactions
reports.query:
CALL apoc.when($neodash_max_cognate = "Best", 'RETURN ["Y"] as cognate_options', 'RETURN ["Y", "N"] as cognate_options') YIELD value WITH value.cognate_options as cognate_options
CALL apoc.case([
  $neodash_domain_properties["type"] = "Pfam", 'MATCH (ssf)<-[:IS_IN_PFAM_CLAN]-(d:pfamDomain {domain: neodash_domain_properties["domain"]}) WITH cognate_options, parity_cutoff, ssf.clanID as ssf_desc MATCH (b:cognateLigand)<-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]-(bl:boundEntity)<-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]-(d:pfamDomain)-[rel:IS_IN_PFAM_CLAN]->(ssf:pfamClan {clanID : ssf_desc}) WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options RETURN DISTINCT b.name as CognateLigandName, b.uniqueID as CognateLigandUID, ssf_desc, SIZE(COLLECT(DISTINCT(d.domain))) as domain_count',
  $neodash_domain_properties["type"] = "SCOP", 'MATCH (ssf:scopSuperfamily)<-[:IS_IN_SCOP_SUPERFAMILY]-(sf:scopFamily)<-[:IS_IN_SCOP_FAMILY]-(d:scopDomain {domain: neodash_domain_properties["domain"]}) WITH cognate_options, parity_cutoff, ssf.description as ssf_desc MATCH (b:cognateLigand)<-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]-(bl:boundEntity)<-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]-(d:scopDomain)-[rel:IS_IN_SCOP_FAMILY]->(sf:scopFamily)-[:IS_IN_SCOP_SUPERFAMILY]-(ssf:scopSuperfamily {description: ssf_desc}) WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options RETURN DISTINCT b.name as CognateLigandName, b.uniqueID as CognateLigandUID, ssf_desc, SIZE(COLLECT(DISTINCT(d.domain))) as domain_count', 
$neodash_domain_properties["type"] = "CATH", 'MATCH (ssf:cathHomologousSuperfamily)<-[:IS_IN_CATH_HOMOLOGOUS_SUPERFAMILY]-(d:cathDomain {domain: neodash_domain_properties["domain"]}) WITH cognate_options, parity_cutoff, ssf.cathHomologousSuperfamily as ssf_desc MATCH (b:cognateLigand)<-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]-(bl:boundEntity)<-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]-(d:cathDomain)-[rel:IS_IN_CATH_HOMOLOGOUS_SUPERFAMILY]->(ssf:cathHomologousSuperfamily {cathHomologousSuperfamily : ssf_desc}) WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options RETURN DISTINCT b.name as CognateLigandName, b.uniqueID as CognateLigandUID, ssf_desc, SIZE(COLLECT(DISTINCT(d.domain))) as domain_count'], 
'RETURN NULL', {neodash_domain_properties: $neodash_domain_properties, parity_cutoff: $neodash_parity_score_cutoff, cognate_options: cognate_options}) YIELD value
WITH value.CognateLigandName[0] as `Cognate Ligand Name`, value.CognateLigandUID as CognateLigandUID, value.ssf_desc as Superfamily, value.domain_count as `#Domains` RETURN `Cognate Ligand Name`, `#Domains`,  CognateLigandUID as __buniqueid ORDER BY `#Domains` DESC

reports.title: Table 1: `$neodash_domain_properties["domain"]` Cognate Ligand Superfamily Breakdown
reports.query:
CALL apoc.when($neodash_max_cognate = "Best", 'RETURN ["Y"] as cognate_options', 'RETURN ["Y", "N"] as cognate_options') YIELD value WITH value.cognate_options as cognate_options
MATCH (d:domain) WHERE d.domain = $neodash_domain_properties["domain"]
WITH properties(d) as neodash_domain_properties, cognate_options
CALL apoc.case([
  neodash_domain_properties["type"] = "CATH", 'MATCH (ssf:cathHomologousSuperfamily)<-[:IS_IN_CATH_HOMOLOGOUS_SUPERFAMILY]-(d:cathDomain {domain: domain_id})-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]->(be:boundEntity)-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(bl:cognateLigand) WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options WITH cognate_options, parity_score_cutoff, ssf, collect(DISTINCT(bl.uniqueID)) as bl_uniqueids MATCH (ssf:cathHomologousSuperfamily)<-[rel:IS_IN_CATH_HOMOLOGOUS_SUPERFAMILY]-(d:cathDomain) WITH cognate_options, parity_score_cutoff, bl_uniqueids, ssf, COUNT(DISTINCT(d)) as ssf_domcount OPTIONAL MATCH (ssf:cathHomologousSuperfamily)<-[rel:IS_IN_CATH_HOMOLOGOUS_SUPERFAMILY]-(cd:cathDomain)-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]->(be:boundEntity)-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(bl:cognateLigand) WHERE bl.uniqueID in bl_uniqueids and sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options RETURN ssf.cathHomologousSuperfamily as ssf_desc, ssf_domcount, bl.name as cognate_ligand, bl.uniqueID as bl_uniqueID,  COUNT(DISTINCT(cd)) * 1.0 /ssf_domcount as perc_ssf_bind_ligand, COUNT(DISTINCT(cd)) as ssf_bind_ligand', 
  neodash_domain_properties["type"] = "SCOP", 'MATCH (ssf:scopSuperfamily)<-[:IS_IN_SCOP_SUPERFAMILY]-(sf:scopFamily)<-[:IS_IN_SCOP_FAMILY]-(d:scopDomain {domain: domain_id})-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]->(be:boundEntity)-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(bl:cognateLigand) WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options WITH cognate_options, parity_score_cutoff, ssf, collect(DISTINCT(bl.uniqueID)) as bl_uniqueids MATCH (ssf)<-[:IS_IN_SCOP_SUPERFAMILY]-(sf:scopFamily)<-[:IS_IN_SCOP_FAMILY]-(d:scopDomain) WITH cognate_options, parity_score_cutoff, bl_uniqueids, ssf, COUNT(DISTINCT(d)) as ssf_domcount OPTIONAL MATCH (ssf)<-[:IS_IN_SCOP_SUPERFAMILY]-(sf:scopFamily)<-[:IS_IN_SCOP_FAMILY]-(sd:scopDomain)-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]->(be:boundEntity)-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(bl:cognateLigand) WHERE bl.uniqueID in bl_uniqueids AND sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options RETURN ssf.description as ssf_desc, ssf_domcount, bl.name as cognate_ligand, bl.uniqueID as bl_uniqueID, COUNT(DISTINCT(sd)) * 1.0 /ssf_domcount as perc_ssf_bind_ligand, COUNT(DISTINCT(sd)) as ssf_bind_ligand',  
  neodash_domain_properties["type"] = "Pfam", 'MATCH (ssf:pfamClan)<-[:IS_IN_PFAM_CLAN]-(d:pfamDomain {domain: domain_id})-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]->(be:boundEntity)-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(bl:cognateLigand) WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options WITH cognate_options, parity_score_cutoff, ssf, collect(DISTINCT(bl.uniqueID)) as bl_uniqueids MATCH (ssf:pfamClan)<-[:IS_IN_PFAM_CLAN]-(d:pfamDomain) WITH cognate_options, parity_score_cutoff, bl_uniqueids, ssf, COUNT(DISTINCT(d)) as ssf_domcount OPTIONAL MATCH (ssf:pfamClan)<-[:IS_IN_PFAM_CLAN]-(pd:pfamDomain)-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]->(be:boundEntity)-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(bl:cognateLigand) WHERE bl.uniqueID in bl_uniqueids AND sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options RETURN ssf.clanID as ssf_desc, ssf_domcount, bl.name as cognate_ligand, bl.uniqueID as bl_uniqueID, COUNT(DISTINCT(pd)) * 1.0 /ssf_domcount as perc_ssf_bind_ligand, COUNT(DISTINCT(pd)) as ssf_bind_ligand'], 
"RETURN NULL", {cognate_options: cognate_options, domain_id:neodash_domain_properties["domain"], parity_score_cutoff: $neodash_parity_score_cutoff}) YIELD value
WITH value.ssf_domcount as ssf_domcount, value.cognate_ligand[0] as cognate_ligand, value.perc_ssf_bind_ligand as perc_ssf_bind_ligand, value.ssf_bind_ligand as ssf_bind_ligand
RETURN cognate_ligand as `Cognate Ligand`, round(perc_ssf_bind_ligand * 100,2) as `% Superfamily Binding Ligand`, ssf_bind_ligand as `# Domains Binding Ligand`, ssf_domcount as `# Domains in Superfamily` ORDER BY `% Superfamily Binding Ligand` DESC

reports.title: CogLig<->SF PDBs
reports.query:
CALL apoc.when($neodash_max_cognate = "Best", 'RETURN ["Y"] as cognate_options', 'RETURN ["Y", "N"] as cognate_options') YIELD value WITH value.cognate_options as cognate_options
CALL apoc.case([$neodash_domain_properties["type"] = "Pfam", 'MATCH (b:cognateLigand {uniqueID: cognate_ligand_id})<-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]-(bl:boundEntity)<-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]-(d:pfamDomain)-[rel:IS_IN_PFAM_CLAN]->(ssf:pfamClan {clanID : ssf_desc}) WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options WITH d MATCH (d)-[:IS_IN_PROTEIN_CHAIN]->(pc:proteinChain)-[:IS_IN_PDB]->(a:entry) RETURN DISTINCT a.pdbEntry as pdbEntry', $neodash_domain_properties["type"] = "SCOP", 'MATCH (b:cognateLigand {uniqueID: cognate_ligand_id})<-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]-(bl:boundEntity)<-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]-(d:scopDomain)-[rel:IS_IN_SCOP_FAMILY]->(sf:scopFamily)-[:IS_IN_SCOP_SUPERFAMILY]-(ssf:scopSuperfamily {description : ssf_desc}) WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options WITH d MATCH (d)-[:IS_IN_PROTEIN_CHAIN]->(pc:proteinChain)-[:IS_IN_PDB]->(a:entry) RETURN DISTINCT a.pdbEntry as pdbEntry',  $neodash_domain_properties["type"] = "CATH", 'MATCH (b:cognateLigand {uniqueID: cognate_ligand_id})<-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]-(bl:boundEntity)<-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]-(d:cathDomain)-[rel:IS_IN_CATH_HOMOLOGOUS_SUPERFAMILY]->(ssf:cathHomologousSuperfamily {cathHomologousSuperfamily : ssf_desc}) WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat(parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options WITH d MATCH (d)-[:IS_IN_PROTEIN_CHAIN]->(pc:proteinChain)-[:IS_IN_PDB]->(a:entry) RETURN DISTINCT a.pdbEntry as pdbEntry'], 'RETURN NULL as pdbEntry', {parity_score_cutoff: $neodash_parity_score_cutoff, ssf_desc: $neodash_domain_superfamily, cognate_ligand_id: $neodash_superfamily_cognate_ligand, cognate_options: cognate_options}) YIELD value
WITH value.pdbEntry as pdbEntry
ORDER BY pdbEntry ASC
RETURN pdbEntry as `PDB ID`

reports.title: Results
reports.query:
CALL apoc.when($neodash_max_cognate = "Best", 'RETURN ["Y"] as cognate_options', 'RETURN ["Y", "N"] as cognate_options') YIELD value WITH value.cognate_options as cognate_options
WITH $neodash_domain_uniqueid_query AS searchString, cognate_options
MATCH (d:domain)
WHERE toUpper(d.domain) CONTAINS toUpper(searchString) AND d.type = $neodash_domain_filter_1
WITH d, cognate_options
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]->(bl:boundEntity)-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(cog:cognateLigand)
WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat($neodash_parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options
WITH d, size(collect(DISTINCT(cog.uniqueID))) as cognate_ligand_count
CALL apoc.case([d.type = "SCOP", "MATCH (d)-[:IS_IN_SCOP_FAMILY]->(sf:scopFamily)-[:IS_IN_SCOP_SUPERFAMILY]->(ssf:scopSuperfamily) RETURN d, ssf.description as ssf_desc, cognate_ligand_count", d.type = "CATH", "MATCH (d)-[:IS_IN_CATH_HOMOLOGOUS_SUPERFAMILY]->(ch:cathHomologousSuperfamily) RETURN d, ch.cathHomologousSuperfamily as ssf_desc, cognate_ligand_count", d.type = "Pfam", "MATCH (d)-[:IS_IN_PFAM_CLAN]->(pc:pfamClan) RETURN d, pc.clanID as ssf_desc, cognate_ligand_count"], 'RETURN NULL', {d:d, cognate_ligand_count: cognate_ligand_count}) YIELD value 
WITH value.ssf_desc as Superfamily, value.d as d, value.cognate_ligand_count as cognate_ligand_count
RETURN DISTINCT d.domain, d.url as __url, cognate_ligand_count as __cognate_ligand_count, properties(d) as __domain_properties LIMIT 1000

reports.title: Search
reports.query: RETURN true;

reports.title: Search
reports.query: RETURN true;

formFields.query:
MATCH ()-[n:`INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND`]->() 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`interactionMode`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`interactionMode` as value,  n.`interactionMode` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: $neodash_bl_query_name Binding Domains
reports.query:
CALL apoc.when($neodash_max_cognate = "Best", 'RETURN ["Y"] as cognate_options', 'RETURN ["Y", "N"] as cognate_options') YIELD value WITH value.cognate_options as cognate_options
MATCH (pdb:entry)<-[:IS_IN_PDB]-(pc:proteinChain)<-[:IS_IN_PROTEIN_CHAIN]-(d)-[int:INTERACTS_WITH_LIGAND]->(be:boundEntity)-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]->(bl:cognateLigand {uniqueID: $neodash_bl_query_unique_id})
WHERE d.type = $neodash_domain_filter_1 AND sim.parityScore >= toFloat($neodash_parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options AND NOT int.interactionMode IN $neodash_interacts_with_ligand_interactionmode_1
WITH * 
CALL apoc.case([
  d.type = 'CATH', 'MATCH (d:cathDomain)-[rel:IS_IN_CATH_HOMOLOGOUS_SUPERFAMILY]->(ssf:cathHomologousSuperfamily) RETURN d, int, pdb, ssf.cathHomologousSuperfamily as ssf_desc, rel', d.type = 'SCOP', 'MATCH (d:scopDomain)-[rel:IS_IN_SCOP_FAMILY]->(sf:scopFamily)-[:IS_IN_SCOP_SUPERFAMILY]->(ssf:scopSuperfamily) RETURN d, int, pdb, ssf.description as ssf_desc, rel', d.type = 'Pfam', 'MATCH (d:pfamDomain)-[rel:IS_IN_PFAM_CLAN]->(ssf:pfamClan) RETURN d, int, pdb, ssf.name as ssf_desc, rel', d.type = "InterProHomologousSuperfamily", "RETURN d, int, pdb, d.name as ssf_desc, NULL as rel"], 'RETURN NULL AS ssf_desc', {d: d, int:int, pdb:pdb}) YIELD value
WITH value.ssf_desc as ssf_desc, value.pdb as pdb, value.int as int
WITH ssf_desc, collect(DISTINCT(int.interactionMode)) as `Interaction Mode(s)`, collect(DISTINCT(pdb.pdbEntry)) as pdbs, size(collect(distinct(pdb.pdbEntry))) as pdb_size
ORDER BY pdb_size DESC
RETURN DISTINCT ssf_desc, `Interaction Mode(s)`, pdb_size as `#PDBs`, pdbs as __pdbs LIMIT 100

settings.noDataMessage: No matching domains. Try altering the global ProCogGraph parity score on the home page.

reports.title: Matching Cognate Ligands: $neodash_biological_ligand_name
reports.query:
CALL apoc.when(toLower($neodash_biological_ligand_name) STARTS WITH  "id:", 'RETURN "id" as search_type, apoc.text.replace($neodash_biological_ligand_name, "^id:", "") AS search', 'RETURN "name_db" as search_type, [part IN split(toUpper($neodash_biological_ligand_name), ",")] AS search', {neodash_biological_ligand_name: $neodash_biological_ligand_name}) YIELD value WITH value.search_type as search_type, value.search as search
WITH search_type, search
CALL apoc.case([
  search_type = "id", 'MATCH (bl:cognateLigand) WHERE bl.uniqueID = $search RETURN bl', 
  search_type = "name_db", 'MATCH (bl:cognateLigand) WHERE ANY(item IN $search WHERE ANY(name in bl.name WHERE toUpper(name) CONTAINS item) OR ANY(db IN bl.ligandDB WHERE toUpper(db) CONTAINS item)) RETURN bl as bl'], 
"RETURN NULL", {search: search}) YIELD value WITH value.bl as bl
RETURN DISTINCT bl.name[0] AS bl_name, properties(bl) as __properties , bl.uniqueID AS __uniqueID, "http://localhost:8080/procogdash/web/smiles_viewer.html?type=smiles&data=" + apoc.text.urlencode(apoc.convert.toJson({name: bl.name[0], smiles: bl.canonicalSMILES})) as __iframe_url, apoc.text.join([db in bl.ligandDB | "* [" + db + "]" + apoc.text.replace(apoc.text.replace(apoc.text.replace(apoc.text.replace(apoc.text.replace(apoc.text.replace(apoc.text.replace(db, "_CHEBI:[0-9]+", ""), 'KEGG:', '(https://www.genome.jp/entry/'), 'Pubchem:', '(https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/compound/'), 'CHEBI:', '(https://www.ebi.ac.uk/chebi/searchId.do?chebiId=CHEBI:'), 'GlyTouCan:', '(https://glytoucan.org/Structures/Glycans/'), 'RHEA:', '(https://www.rhea-db.org/rhea/'), 'BRENDA:', '(https://www.brenda-enzymes.org/ligand.php?brenda_ligand_id=')], ")  \n") + ")" as __ligand_db

reports.title: Matching PDBs containing cog lig
reports.query:
CALL apoc.when($neodash_max_cognate = "Best", 'RETURN ["Y"] as cognate_options', 'RETURN ["Y", "N"] as cognate_options') YIELD value WITH value.cognate_options as cognate_options
MATCH (bl:cognateLigand {uniqueID: toString($neodash_bl_query_unique_id)})<-[sim:HAS_SIMILARITY]-(be:boundEntity)-[:IS_IN_PDB]->(pdb:entry)
WHERE sim.parityScore >= toFloat($neodash_parity_score_cutoff) AND sim.bestCognate in cognate_options
RETURN DISTINCT(pdb.pdbEntry) as pdbEntries LIMIT 1000

reports.title: REPORT FOR `$neodash_bl_properties[name]`
reports.query:
Add a report here on the cognate ligand which summarises somethings from the table and includes the ligand DB results - maybe we can make those into hyperlinks?

$neodash_bl_liganddb

reports.title: Structure
reports.query: $neodash_iframe_url_cognate

reports.title: Bound Ligand Table
reports.query:
MATCH (a:entry)<-[b:IS_IN_PDB]-(be:boundEntity {ligandUniqueID: $neodash_bd_uniqueid})
RETURN DISTINCT a.pdbEntry as `PDB Entry` LIMIT 1000

reports.title: Search
reports.query: RETURN true;

HOW FOTEN IS A PDB LIGAND FOUND IN STRUCTURES

AND A BREAKDOWN OF THE DOMAINS THAT INTERACT WITH THE PDB LIGAND ? 

$neodash_pdb_ligand_properties

reports.title: Results
reports.query:
WITH $neodash_boundentity_query AS searchString
MATCH (bd:boundDescriptor)<-[r:DESCRIBED_BY]-()
WHERE toUpper(bd.name) CONTAINS toUpper(searchString) OR toUpper(bd.description) CONTAINS toUpper(searchString) or searchString = bd.uniqueID
RETURN DISTINCT bd.name AS bd_name, properties(bd) as __properties , bd.uniqueID AS __uniqueID, "http://localhost:8080/web/smiles_viewer.html?type=smiles&data=" + apoc.text.urlencode(apoc.convert.toJson({name: bd.name, smiles: bd.descriptor})) as __iframe_url, count(r) as __num_entities ORDER BY __num_entities DESC LIMIT 1000

reports.title: Structure
reports.query: $neodash_iframe_url_pdbligand

reports.title: Enzyme Search
reports.query: RETURN true;

reports.title: EC $neodash_enzyme_focus Info
reports.query:
**$neodash_enzymeclass_id** : $neodash_enzymeclass_desc


**$neodash_enzymesubclass_id** : $neodash_enzymesubclass_desc


**$neodash_enzymesubsubclass_id** : $neodash_enzymesubsubclass_desc


**$neodash_enzyme_focus** : $neodash_enzyme_desc : $neodash_blsize cognate ligands at $neodash_parity_score_cutoff Parity Score (see biological ligands table below)

reports.title: PDBs : $neodash_enzyme_focus
reports.query:
MATCH (pdb:entry)<-[:IS_IN_PDB]-(pc:proteinChain) WHERE
$neodash_enzyme_focus IN pc.ecList
RETURN DISTINCT pdb.pdbEntry as `PDB ID`

reports.title: Cognate Ligands: $neodash_enzyme_focus
reports.query:
MATCH (ec:ecID {ecID: $neodash_enzyme_focus})<-[:IS_IN_EC]-(bl:cognateLigand)
RETURN DISTINCT bl.name as `Cognate Ligand`

settings.noDataMessage: No biological ligands found for enzyme.

reports.title: Matching Enzymes for $neodash_enzyme_query
reports.query:
MATCH (bl:cognateLigand)-[:IS_IN_EC]->(ec:ecID)-[:IS_IN_SUBSUBCLASS]->(ecssc:ecSubSubClass)-[:IS_IN_SUBCLASS]->(ecsc:ecSubClass)-[:IS_IN_CLASS]->(ecc:ecClass)
WHERE ec.ecID in apoc.text.split($neodash_enzyme_query, ",") or ecssc.ecID = $neodash_enzyme_query or ecsc.ecID = $neodash_enzyme_query or ecc.ecID = $neodash_enzyme_query
RETURN DISTINCT ec.ecID as `EC ID`, ec.description as __ec_description, ecssc.description as __ecssc_desc, ecssc.ecID as __ecssc_id, ecsc.description as __ecsc_description, ecsc.ecID as __ecsc_id, ecc.description as __ecc_description, ecc.ecID as __ecc_id, count(DISTINCT(bl.uniqueID)) as __blsize, "http://www.localhost:8080/web/smiles_viewer.html?type=reaction&data=" + apoc.text.urlencode(apoc.convert.toJson(ec.reactionSmiles)) as __ec_iframe_url

reports.title: Report for EC $neodash_enzyme_focus
reports.query:
